resources.string: Enter contact link or contact JSON manually
Note: Connecting this device as a public peer may result in additional traffic utilization while it stays online. This may incur additional charges from your mobile operator.
I agree to connect this device as a public peer.
Your call is being recorded by some other app(s)
Protect your CupLink identity with a strong backup password

CupLink is the first video-calling Serverless DApp to incorporate a VPN (Virtual Public Network). The Triple-layer encryption design, provides extra security to ensure your calls are private and protected.

CupLink allows your device to self-generate its identity, using a private key, offering a unique and secure way to connect. We’ve also added call spy detection feature so you can be in-call instantly notified, if you are monitored.

When it comes to call quality, we’ve got you covered with adjustable ultra-high-definition video, all the way up to 8K resolution.

Built to give you seamless, secure, and high-quality communication without compromising your privacy.

CupLink is the first serverless video-calling dApp with an integrated VPN, offering triple-layer encryption for ultimate call privacy.

Your device generates a unique, secure identity with a private key, while our call spy detection feature keeps you notified of any third party monitoring background services.

All this, paired with ultra-high-definition video up to 8K resolution, ensures seamless and secure communication.

Your privacy, uncompromised
Are you sure you want to exit the app?
Restore your CupLink identity with a backup password
